gates_pending: Gate 3: Proposal Structure (anti-template format used, traditional validator mismatch)
handoff_to_protocol_02.notes: Proposal follows Protocol 01's anti-template structure (Observation → Interpretation → Approach → Proof → CTA) which differs from traditional validator expectations (greeting → understanding → deliverables → timeline). Human voice compliance verified at 0.97/1.00.
